attributes.action: A review of Air Passenger Duty
attributes.additional_details: Levels of this tax have become excessive. £282 tax on an £88 flight to Abu Dhabi is I feel extortionate I would like the government to look again at this so called green tax the revenue from which, I believe, is not spent on any green issues. Surely the British Tax Payer could be allowed one holiday a year free of this tax.
